scdf-data-analytics.title: Data Analytics
scdf-data-analytics.overview: Leveraged an emergency vehicle placement machine learning application to recommend effective placement of 8 fire bases and 35 ambulances over a 13-year period. Led a cross-functional team of 4 in utilising Tableau and TensorFlow to uncover trends in false fire alarm reports. Devised a recommendation engine detecting 43 anomalies in call centre system triaging processes. Executed exploratory data analysis for 12 projects across 6 departments, enabling data-driven decision-making to improve operational efficiency.

mom-data-management.title: Data Management
mom-data-management.overview: Developed data architecture models, PostgreSQL data pipelines and Power BI dashboards to enable manpower analysis. Published an organisation-wide SharePoint portal to effectively communicate data governance policies.

qi-software-engineering.title: Software Engineering Intern
qi-software-engineering.overview: Designed and built a web application using React and Ruby on Rails to feature company optimisation models, using Postman and Selenium to create comprehensive test suites. Created and deployed a tailored map solution with OpenLayers and React to effectively communicate model outputs, enhancing the interactive experience for potential clients.

vrmc-robotics.title: Programming Head
vrmc-robotics.overview: Organised and conducted training sessions on programming in Python and C, preparing club members to participate in various robotics and programming competitions. Played a pivotal role in planning and executing an annual club orientation camp, showcasing quick-thinking skills by improvising and implementing backup activities.
